thread.title: Hopkins, Bryant highlight NFL Tigers in Week 6
thread.title_full: Hopkins, Bryant highlight NFL Tigers in Week 6

title: Hopkins, Bryant highlight NFL Tigers in Week 6
text:
Hopkins, Bryant highlight NFL Tigers in Week 6 by Daniel Shirley - Correspondent - Tuesday, October 20, 2015 11:01 PM | Photo by Jason Bridge/USAT 
The past few years, Clemson has staked its claim as WRU, and Sunday’s NFL results certainly didn’t hurt that assertion. #6 6-2, 205Central, SC View Full Profile continued his early season roll with 10 catches for 148 yards and two touchdowns against Jacksonville. In doing so, Hopkins became the first player in NFL history with at least nine catches and 145 yards in three straight games. 
His former Clemson teammate, Martavis Bryant Martavis Bryant #1 6-5, 200Calhoun Falls, SC View Full Profile made his season debut with Pittsburgh and made it count with six catches for 137 yards and two touchdowns against Arizona.
